title: Junior Web Developer
description: Started my professional journey as a junior developer, focusing on frontend development using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Worked on multiple client projects from Southeast Asia and Eastern Europe, building responsive web applications and learning modern development practices.
achievements: Developed 8+ client websites with responsive designs
Improved page load times by average of 35% through optimization
Collaborated with international teams on diverse projects

title: Full-Stack Web Developer
description: Progressed to full-stack development, working on more complex projects involving both frontend and backend development. Specialized in building RESTful APIs with Python and creating interactive user interfaces. Gained experience working with databases, authentication systems, and third-party API integrations.
achievements: Built 12+ full-stack applications for clients worldwide
Developed REST APIs handling 10,000+ daily requests
Reduced API response times by 45% through optimization

title: Senior Web Developer
description: Advanced to senior developer role, leading development teams and architecting complex web solutions. Focused on performance optimization, scalable architecture, and modern development practices. Worked on high-traffic applications serving users across multiple continents.
achievements: Improved application performance by average of 60%
Implemented CI/CD pipelines reducing deployment time by 70%

title: Independent Developer & Consultant
description: Currently working as an independent developer and consultant, focusing on cutting-edge projects including IoT integration and smart home automation. Developing a comprehensive Smart Home Automation System that integrates multiple devices and platforms, showcasing expertise in modern web technologies and Python backend development.
